reviews.text: Coming back to Gremelle where Francois and Nadya runs the household is a very nice experience. Cosy place with a friendly atmosphere, good food and lovely wines from the area makes this excellent value for money. It is also close to Dijon and Beaune, and therefore very much an ideal place to stay when on the wine trails of Burgundy. Try it...
reviews.title: This is nice....
Pleasant stop over hotel not far from Beaune
reviews.text: La Gremelle is on the N174, 7km N of Beaune. Pleasant dining room / terrace serving very good food. Bedrooms are adequate, quiet even though just off the main road. There is also a swimming pool to cool off in after the journey down. Short journey into Beaune for sightseeing. At around £45 pp for half board, very good value. Logis de France hotel.
